name: Power Sayings
tag_list: inspirational-quotes, proverbs-on-success, life-sayings, daily-inspirational-quotation, life-quotes, hope-quotes, success-quotes, sayings-about-life, quotes-about-life, inspirational-quote-of-day, inspiring-quote, inspiring-sayings, quotations, proverbs
overview:
The Power Sayings 2010 application provides you with a superb collection of 3000 inspirational quotes, proverbs on success and life sayings.

It is a much easier and faster alternative for free quote websites or books. The application welcomes you with a daily inspirational quote, has a library of life sayings with instant search and a personal ratings feature.

Quotes and proverbs are one of the most effective ways to grab your audience’s attention. Writers, speakers, students and word seekers worldwide use them when they want to launch a new chapter, spice up a speech or make an idea more credible and memorable. Apt sayings convince, persuade and give an implicit impression of truth.

Inspirational quotes, proverbs on success and life sayings also act as guides, pointers and life tips you can read for motivation and to add a positive thought to your day. They’re a great tool for building a success mentality. Sayings can put you in a life altering state of mind that can produce amazing results.

You often have two sources when looking for inspirational quotes - reference books and websites. But neither of them provides a great user experience. They’re not ideal when you want to quickly search for an inspirational quote, or read and remember it without distractions or straining your eyes. They don’t give you a way keep track of your favorite life saying and proverbs on success.

Power Sayings delivers the world’s best inspirational quotes, life sayings and proverbs on success because we believe these are the sayings that people value most today.

Visit http://PowerSayings.com to download it and get inspired now!
